Detailed Description

This class is used by TaskManagerTP to run a parallel for method.

Member Function Documentation

void SystemParallelForWrapper::Process ( void   )  [virtual]

This method calls the parallel for method with some instrumentation to record the time taken for the call.

Implements WorkItem.
